sourcesContent:
import "./Checkout.css"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import Cart from "../../Cart/Cart"; import vatCalculator from "../../../utils/vatCalculator"; import useFormAndValidation from "../../../utils/useFormAndValidation"; const Checkout = ({ cart, totalPrice }) => { const { values, handleChange, errors, isValid, resetForm, setValues } = useFormAndValidation(); const grandTotal = vatCalculator(totalPrice) + 50 + totalPrice; const shippingPrice = 50; useEffect(() => { resetForm(); setValues({}); }, []); return (

Checkout

TOTAL

{`$ ${totalPrice}`}

SHIPPING

{`$ ${shippingPrice}`}

VAT (INCLUDED)

{`$ ${vatCalculator( totalPrice )}`}

GRAND TOTAL

{`$ ${grandTotal}`}
); }; export default Checkout;
